actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Government Operations.

Executive Comment Requested from ACTION, CAB, Civil Rights Comm, EEOC, Community Services Admin, DC Mayor, EPA, Consumer Product Safety Comm, FCC, FDIC, Ex-Im Bank, Fed Election Comm, FERC, FTC, Federal Reserve, GSA.
Executive Comment Requested from DOD, Education, DOE, DOT, HHS, HUD, Interior, Justice, Labor, State, USDA, Treasury, Fed Home Loan Bank Brd, Fed Maritime Comm.
Referred to Subcommittee on Legislation and National Security.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Legislation and National Security

official_title: A joint resolution to require the General Services Administration to hold an annual meeting of the Information Resources Managers of the various Federal Agencies.

summary.text: Requires the Administrator of the General Services Administration to hold an annual meeting of Federal Government computer users to be attended by the Information Resources Manager of each agency. Requires the Administrator to report annually to the House Committee on Appropriations on the Users' Group meeting, including estimates of the obtainable savings, if recommendations were to be adopted, and the effectiveness of the group in sharing automated data processing experiences and concerns. Authorizes appropriations.

titles.title: A joint resolution to require the General Services Administration to hold an annual meeting of the Information Resources Managers of the various Federal Agencies.
